title: Cosa Notra Beekeeper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee to frame any player as a role of your choice to all investigative effects.
- Use 2 bees to redirect a player to another player of your choice tonight and the next if both are still alive.
- Use 3 bees to deal a Basic attack to a random non-Mafia player who visits a player of your choice.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You will earn 1 bee every night. You can use 2 abilities per night.

desc:
Post 2702
*I'll make him a bzzzz he can't refuse.*
